original_text: Among the smooth stones of the stream is thy portion; they, they are thy lot: even to them hast thou poured a drink offering, thou hast offered a meat offering. Should I receive comfort in these?
korean_text: 골짜기 가운데 매끄러운 돌들 중에 네 몫이 있으니 그것들이 곧 네가 제비 뽑아 얻은 것이라 또한 네가 전제와 예물을 그것들에게 드리니 내가 어찌 위로를 받겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Among the smooth stones of the stream is thy portion
sentences.korean_translation: 시내의 매끄러운 돌들 중에 너의 몫이 있구나

sentences.original_text: even to them hast thou poured a drink offering
thou hast offered a meat offering
Should I receive comfort in these?
